name: Bob Boberson
story: My wife passed away several years ago. I found myself unable to function in everyday life. I lost my job and couldn't pick myself up. After I lost my home, I lived on friends couches for a few months. I finally woke up and realized that I needed to start living my life again. I am ready to work. I have experience as a programmer, but will start anywhere.
goal: My life goal is to be happier today than I was yesterday.

updates.text: Thanks to this program, I met a guy who was looking for someone with my skillset. I was just offered a job as a junior developer!
I just opened a new bank account! Paychecks are coming in.
Just closed on my new home!

name: Anita Jones
story: I would rather not say how I got to where I am, but I am not content. I am a hard worker, with a heart of gold. I am hoping that my life will turn around.
goal: My life goal is to own my own home and start a daycare.

updates.text: Since joining this program, I have connected with a family that needed a live-in nanny. Now I have a home and a new family.
I love what I am doing, life couldn't be better.

name: Jack Meyer
story: I was a writer for 25 years. When I lost my job, I didn't know where to turn. The Contributor has helped to keep me motivated. I see the same folks everyday while I am standing on the corner selling the paper. Who knows, maybe one of them will be my future employer.
goal: My goal in life is to write a book about my journey.

updates.text: I'm so thankful for this program
I just started chapter one of my life story.

name: Hugh Jamin
story: I was in a car accident several years back. I was injured and unable to work. Things just started to fall apart and I found myself without a job or a home. I have been selling papers for the Contributor and I enjoy meeting and talking with new people everyday.
goal: My goal in life is to be a pilot.

updates.text: One of my Contributor customers is a man who has been a pilot for 10 years. He is going to give my flying lessons!
Thanks to this program I have received several donations and I am going to make some investments for my future.

name: Sal Lami
story: I am in this position because of a series of bad decisions I made when I was younger. I am a better man today than I was then and I want to make a change. I want to get a job and a home and I am willing to do the work to make that happen. I am hoping that through this program I am able to make the connections necessary to make that happen.
goal: My goal in life is to be a successful man, to get married and have 3 children.

updates.text: I just met up with someone through this program who has offered me a job. It's a great opportunity.
I just got promoted to manager.
